description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The enemy is about to take over our forward base. Defend our base and make an impression on the online scoreboard. Missile interceptors, RPG's, turrets and health packs are at your disposal against enemy tanks, helicopters, jets and RPG launchers. The battle is on!  Developer: Candela Creations Sounds: Soundsnap Boxart cloud art adapted from a 'storm clouds' image by Flickr user Chad Johnson
description.short: The enemy is about to take over our forward base. Defend our base and make an impression on the online scoreboard. Missile interceptors, RPG's, turrets and health packs are at your disposal against enemy tanks, helicopters, jets and RPG launchers. The battle is on!  Developer: Candela Creations Sounds: Soundsnap Boxart cloud art adapted from a 'storm clouds' image by Flickr user Chad Johnson
